nodes.text: JD's Introduction to The New Jedi Order

JD's Introduction to The New Jedi Order is a role-playing article that was written by J.D. Wiker. The supplement was published online by Wizards of the Coast in 2002 as an introduction and commentary on the events of the New Jedi Order books, as well as some of the themes and real-life parallels to the Yuuzhan Vong War.
